fields.headline: Yacrosoft news update
fields.bodyText: What next for Yahoo? Yahoo's decision to reject Microsoft's $31-a-share offer has left the market speculating on whether the search giant may now turn to AOL or even Google. Source: Guardian Yahoo rejects Microsoft takeover bid Yahoo formally rejected Microsoft's unsolicited $31-a-share takeover bid today, claiming the offer $41bn was too low. Source: Guardian Yahoo bidder wants a more aggressive Microsoft Microsoft's chief financial officer spent the weekend thinking of ways to raise more funds for Yahoo bid. Source: New York Times Yahoo-Microsoft Photoshop funnies The web laughs, at Yahoo's expense. Source: AllThingsD Via De.icio.us
